Row.Text: [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Completing all three of your Ideals begins a [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age.[ENDCOLOR]
[COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]This Policy cannot be adopted yet because its conditions have not been met.[ENDCOLOR]
[COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]This Policy can no longer be unlocked as you have failed to meet its conditions before the {1_EraDesc}.[ENDCOLOR]
Completing your [COLOR_MAGENTA]Cultural Ideals[ENDCOLOR] has begun a [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] [COLOR_YELLOW]Golden Age[ENDCOLOR]!
